summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Peekaboo indoor playground MVP. Backend APIs fully functional with 8/8 tests passing. Frontend loads correctly with all major features working including homepage, authentication, admin panel, and booking pages. Calendar components functional on tickets and birthday pages.

flaky_endpoints.issue: Slots API may not be generating available time slots
flaky_endpoints.symptoms: Tickets page shows 'No slots available for this date' and 'Failed to load available slots' error

integration_issues.issue: Time slots not displaying on tickets page
integration_issues.details: Calendar loads but no time slots appear for selection

passed_tests: Homepage loads with hero, features, gallery
Birthday page shows 10 themes with calendar
Subscriptions page shows 3 plans with pricing

success_percentage.frontend: 95% (minor slot loading issue on tickets page)

action_item_for_main_agent: Investigate slots API functionality - tickets page shows 'No slots available' and 'Failed to load available slots' error. May need to implement slot generation logic or seed initial time slots data.
